channel.title: Burnley News on News Lancashire
channel.description: Recent content in Burnley News on News Lancashire

item.title: Burnley legend Brian Jensen leaves coaching role after six years
item.description: Burnley legend Brian Jensen has left his coaching role at Shrewsbury Town after six years. Source: Burnley Express

item.title: West Ham boss Nuno Espirito Santo on Burnley clash, Alex Disasi debut and team news
item.description: Many have already written off Burnley in their fight for survival, but if they’re to give themselves any hope – they simply must beat West Ham this weekend. Source: Burnley Express

item.title: 1940s-themed Padiham on Parade to receive a £5,500 boost
item.description: The annual 1940s-themed Padiham on Parade will receive a £5,500 boost. Source: Burnley Express

item.title: Court round-up for Lancaster and Morecambe
item.description: The following people were dealt with by magistrates at Lancaster and Burnley: Source: Lancaster Guardian

item.title: Burnley councillor at centre of row over failing to declare her financial interests speaks for first time to defend herself
item.description: The senior councillor at the centre of a row over failing to properly declare her financial interests has said ‘there was no intent to mislead, no financial gain or attempt to achieve it’. Source: Burnley Express

item.title: Excel Fostering appealing for foster families in Burnley and Pendle
item.description: A fostering agency is urging people across Burnley and Pendle to consider opening their homes to children and young people in care. Source: Burnley Express

item.title: Nelson man arrested on suspicion of exposure to teenage girl
item.description: A 29-year-old man has been arrested on suspicion of exposing himself to a teenage girl close to the Nelson-Burnley border. Source: Burnley Express

item.title: Thompson Park Miniature Railway Society in Burnley looking for new volunteers
item.description: An announcement has been made for wannabe train drivers and other volunteers to help out at Burnley’s popular Thompson Park Miniature Railway Society. Source: Burnley Express

item.title: Four fire engines and hazardous materials unit from Lancashire Fire and Rescue Service called to garage blaze in Padiham
item.description: The hazardous materials unit from Lancashire Fire and Rescue was among the crews called to an incident in Padiham yesterday (Wednesday) Source: Burnley Express

item.title: Police investigating reports of a man exposing himself close to the Nelson and Burnley border
item.description: Police are investigating reports that a man exposed himself to a teenage girl close to the Nelson-Burnley border. Source: Burnley Express

item.title: 'Northerners feel outnumbered at my northern uni'
item.description: Lucy Morville, from Burnley revives York University’s Northern Society to give northerners a home. Source: BBC Lancashire

item.title: New 'music library' opens with aim to inspire the next generation of talent
item.description: A space to host concerts and events - included from up-and-coming musicians - has been opened at Burnley Central Library. Source: LEP Preston

item.title: Burnley's worrying contract situation as Premier League relegation looms large
item.description: What are the latest contract situations at Burnley amid the serious threat of relegation? Source: Burnley Express

item.title: Burnley's Mike Tresor takes to social media to address failed deadline day move to Lille
item.description: Burnley’s Mike Tresor has moved to deny reports he failed a late medical on transfer deadline day. Source: Burnley Express

item.title: New lower-cost return bus ticket for Burnley schoolchildren following MP Oliver Ryan's campaign
item.description: Burnley school children can buy a new, lower-cost “School Return” bus ticket from this weekend. Source: Burnley Express

item.title: Exhibition of ceramics, felting, silk painting and mosaics by arts and craft group Ground Up opens in Burnley's St James Street
item.description: A vibrant showcase of ceramics, felting, silk painting, banners and mosaic has gone on display in Burnley. Source: Burnley Express

item.title: Upcoming traffic changes set to begin in Burnley as improvement works start as part of £55m. Levelling Up investment
item.description: Motorists and pedestrians are set to see huge changes on the main routes into Burnley town centre in the coming months as work beigns on the town’s share of a £55m. improvement programme. Source: Burnley Express

item.title: Culture Burnley Awards 2026: Nominations announced for glittering awards ceremony
item.description: A total of 40 organisations, events, projects and individuals have been shortlisted for this year’s Culture Burnley Awards. Source: Burnley Express

item.title: 'Sticky': Scott Parker addresses Quilindschy Hartman's continued Burnley absence
item.description: Scott Parker admits Burnley need to get Quilindschy Hartman back up to speed after a “sticky” few weeks. Source: Burnley Express
